text: mona kuma ka'afintira nunamuzmia nentahinka, nazankuro rurega vahe'mo'zama kantahima kesaza zana huzmanto. E'ina'ma hananke'za, maka ama mopafi vahe'mo'za, Israeli vahe'mo'zama nehazaza hu'za kage'za antahi'za nehu'za, korora hunegante'za kagorga'a manigahaze. Ana nehu'za ama kagri noma kintoa nonkura, mono hugante'za kagi erisga hu no kinte'ne hu'za ke'za antahi'za hugahaze.
